headline: Holland America Line's 2027 Canada & New England Season Delivers Iconic Lighthouses, National Parks and Culinary Discoveries
summary: Today, Holland America Line announced its 2027 Canada & New England season, featuring a collection of cruises designed to showcase the region's storied national parks and rich heritage — as well as a new itinerary dedicated to the area's iconic lighthouses. In addition to exploring UNESCO World Heritage sites and vibrant cities, guests can expect a front-row seat to the region's stunning scenery while also enjoying an authentic onboard experience.

thumbnail.caption: Volendam's perfect size allows guests to discover gems like Montreal.
